SettingsPage.appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the application.
SettingsPage.pushNotificationsDescription: Receive push notifications on this device.
SettingsPage.inAppSoundsDescription: Play sounds for new notifications in the app.
SettingsPage.highContrastDescription: Improve visibility with higher contrast colors.
SettingsPage.reduceMotionDescription: Limit animations and motion effects in the app.
SettingsPage.privacyDescription: Manage your privacy settings and account security.
SettingsPage.dataDescription: Manage your application data and storage.

Toast.settingsSavedDescription: Your preferences have been notionally updated. Push notification token handling not implemented server-side.
Toast.pushNotSupportedDescription: Push notifications are not supported in this browser or device.
Toast.pushEnabledDescription: You can now receive push notifications on this device. Token (first 20 chars): {token}
Toast.pushDeniedDescription: You have blocked push notifications. Please enable them in your browser settings to receive them.
Toast.pushFailedDescription: Could not enable push notifications at this time.
Toast.pushDisabledDescription: Push notifications UI toggle is off. Manage browser permissions to fully disable.
Toast.errorVapidKey: Could not re-enable push notifications. Ensure VAPID key is set.
Toast.cacheClearedDescription: Application cache has been notionally cleared.
Toast.exportStartedDescription: Your data export will be available shortly.
